ListOfDialogue.Name: SpeakersName
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: This system will contain the players input. This input will then be passed down to the currently attached character. This will allow us to have multiple characters with setting up input on each of them, as well as this, it will make it so that we can swap between characters mid-level easily.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Speaker2sName
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: This system will contain all functionality for a character such as movement and attacking. This class can be used as the root for both player characters and enemy characters. This class will contain the characters health, the weapon it has equipped as well as all death and taking damage functionality.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: They killed my dog.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: Time for my revenge.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: I can probably stab that guy with my dagger by clicking the left mouse button!

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: Maybe I should pick up his weapon by pressing the E key!

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: I can throw my weapon at that guy by pressing the right mouse button!

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: I can explore the room to the left to find cool loot!

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: I can use this scroll to gain powerful buffs.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: Looks like I can only use it once though.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: I should watch out for that mage, their magic is powerful.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: But if I kill them, I can get their magic for myself.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: Best not let that guy with the bell see me. If he does he will tell others that I am here.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: Finally, its time to get my revenge! Emily Cunningham, you shall taste my blade!

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: Is that a page of the Necronomicon?!

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: If I collect all of the pages, maybe I can bring my dog back.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: There should be another member of The Syndicate here.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: They might be holding more pages of the Necronomicon too.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: I guess they didnt have a page here, but I think this information could lead me to another page.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: This should be the location of another Necronomicon page, but its swarming with enemies. Guess Ill have to kill them all to get through.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: Finally, a second page of the Necronomicon. Im one step closer to bringing my dog back.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: Another member of the Syndicate should be here.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: Hopefully they can tell me where to find another page of the Necronomicon.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: They might need some persuading though.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: Looks like they split the page in two.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: Its almost like they want to make my life harder.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: The first half of the page should be here.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: It should be a pretty simple job, but the place seems to be swarming with enemies.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: That was a lot of work for half of a page.

ListOfDialogue.Name: Johnathan Wicke
ListOfDialogue.Dialogue: I hope the next piece isnt as annoying to get.
